Acceptance criteria

  • Endpoint for this type of report is created
  • Data is loaded on the report page load
  • While data is loaded a spinner is shown
  • All orders should be presented in the report
  • Each report entry should contain the actual dish (as it is the current menu report). If a dish contains several items, they should be grouped in a collection

Acceptance criteria

  • Design is discused with Nastia and team
  • All user orders for the date (may be faked) in URL are displayed in the table
  • Each row in the table represents the actual dish (as it is now). If a dish contains several items, items are combined with + sign
  • If nothing is ordered for the user is not omitted. Nothing is shown instead
